## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the proposed feature.

## Use Case
Why is this feature needed? Who benefits from it?

## Proposed Solution
How should this feature work? Include technical details if applicable.

## Alternatives Considered
What other approaches have you thought about?

## Implementation Notes (Optional)
Technical approach, APIs affected, potential challenges.

## Additional Context
Screenshots, mockups, related issues, or examples from other projects.
